title: Defense Grid The Awakening 1.0r41 MULTI5 THETA - 4 Map packs
description:
This is the latest version including the You monster maps.

Genre: Strategy, Indie

Developer: Hidden Path Entertainment

Publisher: Hidden Path Entertainment


About the Game: Defense Grid: The Awakening is a unique spin on tower defense gameplay that will appeal to players of all skill levels. A horde of enemies is invading, and it's up to the player to stop them by strategically building fortification towers around their base. Beautiful environments, spectacular effects, and a dynamic, engaging soundtrack bring the world to life.
